verbs.description: [ARG1: A Trump supporter] [V: showed] up [ARGM-LOC: at the scene of a school shooting in Santa Fe , Texas ,] [ARGM-TMP: on Friday] [ARGM-MNR: with an American flag and a handgun at his waist] , [ARGM-ADV: telling a reporter he was there to " Make America Great Again] . "
